1984.subject: NURS
1984.course_title_long: Healthcare Assessment within the Latino Population
1984.descrlong:
Course will enable nurses to integrate principles of cultural relevancy using Spanish language skills in conducting physical/psychosocial assessments, history taking, & healthcare education amongst Latino sub-groups & their families. Students will apply language skills that are appropriate to communicate with patients' healthcare needs, especially anatomy. Course will serve as an intro to understanding the various cultural sub-groups within the Latino population. (Nursing Dept consent required.)

[(Prereq: NURS 300 and NURS 301 and NURS 302 and NURS 321) and (Coreq: NURS 306 and NURS 310 and NURS 430)]
